item.title: Using PushBullet for Notifications in Android/Chrome
item.description: So I recently got my weechat (IRC) notifications coming to my android via Pushover. I just borrowed the following infomation from my friend Major’s blog post. It was working great, but then Major told me about Pushbullet on Twitter and it’s integration with Chrome and everything else that I alredy use. I finally set it up and noticed that the pushover.pl plugin that I was already using in WeeChat works with Pushbullet also.
